solution_line_template: The benefit of selling one pot is {cost_price_per_pot} * {profit_percentage_value} / {percentage_divisor} = €<<{cost_price_per_pot}*{profit_percentage_value}/{percentage_divisor}={benefit_per_pot}>>{benefit_per_pot}.
So, Françoise will give {num_pots_sold} * €{benefit_per_pot} = €<<{num_pots_sold}*{benefit_per_pot}={total_to_association}>>{total_to_association} to the association.
